name: 20 Seconds
description:
Unfinished first-person platformer game for the IGDA WPI Winter Break Jam 2019-20.

The goal of every level is to reach the end within 20 seconds.

The levels are split into level packs, of which there are 3:

  • Tutorial: 3 levels that teach the basic mechanics
  • Snow Levels: Actual gameplay levels (I only made 3 whoops)
  • Debug: 2 bonus levels I used during development

Supports keyboard/mouse and gamepads (Xbox and PS4 controllers are explicitly supported but others that use standard mappings should work)

Updated with bugfixes (v1.0.1)
